description: Apply Integrated Nested Laplace Approximation (INLA, Rue et al. 2009) to models estimable by gam or bam, using the INLA variant described in Wood (2019). Produces marginal posterior densities for each coefficient, selected coefficients or linear transformations of the coefficient vector.
example_call: ginla(G, A = NULL, nk = 16, nb = 100, J = 1, interactive = FALSE,
